title: Trash players
body: WTF is up with all these trash players in my queue? I've deranked 3 divisions in the last 3 days. i was s1 90 lp, now im s4 75 lp, i get into promo series and i get inters and feeders. Why? I downloaded lol wiz to see my match ups, im facing gold elo and higher, whilst my team is only lower silver high bronze? how can anyone climb? when i was S1 90 lp, i was in gold mmr, yet all my team mates were either low silver or high bronze, or havnt even played yet this season? I dont know how you expect people to climb when my entire team is a lower rank than the opponents, if my team and the opponents team were equally matched (gold with gold, or silver with silver) i wouldn't be able to complain, but i get placed with this bronze trash that ints every game, doesnt ward, doesnt itemise well... This game is starting to tilt me way to much. And no, im not saying i play perfectly, however when i finish laning phase i am normally a few kills up with maybe 1 or 2 deaths. I roam when i think i can make an impact, however nothing comes of it even if i do get my lanes ahead, they itemise incorrectly and just end up throwing. If you dont believe me, watch a few of my games from op.gg summener name : "TTC RASTA" and explain to me how i must get out of this shit.

replies.body: yeah nah nah this never happens to get out of sliver you basically need to have a gold 1 skill level to solo carry games but its totally fair
considering you cant solo carry as i said in my comment no
If you're not winning games then maybe you're the trash one.
I was waiting for this comment. Have you even bothered to go through my match history at all?

You have won 6 games out of the last 20 you have played. 
You have an average death count of 6.5. 

I looked at the past 20 games of you history, and while it is true that a few of your games have been against gold players (all games have had less than one gold on the enemy team) you have also had games where the gold is on your team. Usually both teams are a mixture of B1, S5 and S4. 

It looks more like you are tilted. I would suggest taking a bit of a break before going back on the grind.
No difference between bronze and gold on this server. All shitters that win by either getting ahead and stomping or a teamfight throw in the late game. No game sense whatsoever.
Fair enough, its hella tilting dropping divisions and feeling as if i'm held hostage purely by whether im forunate enough to not have needless deaths on my team.

I understand where TTC RASTA is coming from. I've never seen such trash in all my time on OCE as what players have been doing the past 2 weeks. It was pretty bad before but now people are just potatoes.
It's not that they don't understand the game or how their champion works even. Or the fact that they have no map awareness or macro skills. 

Just LEARN HOW TO USE A MOUSE for one thing!

And don't play league if you have lag. If you have wifi YOU WILL LAG.
If anyone on your internet line is downloading, YOU WILL LAG.
Someone in the house watching Netflix online?, YOU WILL LAG.
Browser looking up stats on op.gg? YOU WILL LAG.
League needs 100% of your bandwidth, it may be designed poorly, but that's how it is, no point pinging your ping time to your team, WE CAN'T HELP YOU. FIX IT.

Whether its my team or the opposition team, the total lack of any skill really gets to me.

Don't play on weekends, anything past 3pm on weekdays or after 1am. Unfortunately the player skill takes a HUGE dive around these times and it's quite noticeable.

Also don't play at all during school holidays unless you feel like climbing back to where you started off at.
